item.description: Don‚Äôt Lose Your Keys üóù Titan Security Keys The new Google Titan Security Key is a clever way to protect yourself in the unfortunate situation where your gmail password has been compromised. Simply put, the key is required to sign into your Google account. Imagine for example your password is, well “password”. Some under-achieving hacker might figure that out and gain access to your email, calendar and G-drive. That would suck because Mr.
